content:
@Manish Goregaokar @JT [they/them] @nikomatsakis We have made good progress on re-examining the annual survey and coming up with the right questions for this year's survey. Given y'all have worked on surveys in the past, can you please take a look at open blocking issues and/or the survey as as a whole.

Would any of you be available to discuss some the issues in a synchronous meeting? Any help would be much appreciated!!!
